verses.name: John 5:9
verses.text: And immediately the man was made whole, and took up his bed, and walked: and on the same day was the sabbath.

verses.name: John 5:10
verses.text: The Jews therefore said unto him that was cured, It is the sabbath day: it is not lawful for thee to carry thy bed.

verses.name: John 5:11
verses.text: He answered them, He that made me whole, the same said unto me, Take up thy bed, and walk.

verses.name: John 5:12
verses.text: Then asked they him, What man is that which said unto thee, Take up thy bed, and walk?
